pullRequest.title: Tidy up rest API client.
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description
Fix validator rest API client to treat 404 as an error, not an expected response that means no data.  The old API was a bit wacky with response codes but the new one shouldn't return 404.
Introduce a infrastructure:http module for HTTP utils that defines constants for status codes to save repeating them everywhere (OkHttpClient doesn't provide the definitions and things like the Servlet API aren't available everywhere).
Documentation

 I thought about documentation and added the documentation label to this PR if updates are required.

commit.message:
Skip looking up duties when there are no validators.
Add debug logging to show the known validator indices.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into tidy-up-rest-client

nodes.bodyText: we want our own copy of standard codes?
